short_summary: purchase one portable marine biochemistry laboratory
full_summary:
================================

### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT #

#### F2402-220146-B Portable Marine Biochemistry Laboratory

**Reference Number:** WS3705751167

**Solicitation Number:** WS3705751167

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the manufacturing, supply, and delivery of a portable marine biochemistry laboratory to be situated in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada.

**Key Milestones:**

* Tender Closing Date: **2023-11-07T14:00:00** (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-11-10**
* Expected Contract End Date: **2024-03-31**

**Bid Submission Requirements:**

* Supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the specified tender closing date.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time will be considered non-responsive.

**Background:**

This tender replaces and supersedes the previous solicitation number Doc3705768441, dated January 23, 2023, with a closing of June 28, 2023.

**Additional Information:**

* Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted offers in the previous solicitation.
* The tender is open to any certified supplier or bidder who adheres to the terms and conditions outlined in the bid solicitation.
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

#### **View Details and Obtain a Copy of the Bid Solicitation Document:**

 [View Notice](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17503845?extsite=MTc1MDM4NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
